attributes.action: Require all airlines operating from the UK to weigh passengers with their luggage to charge accordingly and fairly in an effort to reduce CO2 emissions and fuel consumption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To level the playing field with regard to how much weight you may take on board an aircraft, there should be a Banding system with the lightest people in Band 1 and the heaviest people in Band 5. All passengers should be weighed in at the time of luggage check in, and the appropriate price charged for total weight.
